name: pre-race practice reminder
body: UIC Pyro Paddlers reminder: Hi NAME, our pre-race practice is 6:00 pm on Fri, Jun 21 at Ping Tom Memorial Park. Meet at the pagoda. To confirm, text 1. Text 0 if you can't make it.

body: UIC Pyro Paddlers reminder: Hi NAME, arrive by 7:30 am on Sat, Jun 22 at Ping Tom Memorial Park. Check at registration table for location of our team site. To confirm, text 1. Text 0 if you can't make it.

name: race inquiry
body: Hi NAME, this is your captain, Feihong. We start marshaling at 7:50 am. If you're having problems getting to the race site at Ping Tom Memorial Park, call me at PHONE.
